summary: This is an email from August 12, 2019, discussing technical issues with the recording system at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) where Jeffrey Epstein was held. The FBI is retrieving previous recordings, causing the recording capability to be offline for 8-10 days, though live monitoring remains. The sender inquires about alternative remote recording options.

events.title: FBI retrieval of MCC recordings
events.description: The FBI is retrieving previous recordings from the camera system at the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC), causing recording capabilities to be offline for 8-10 days. Live viewing/monitoring remains active.

keyFacts: The FBI was retrieving previous recordings from the camera system at MCC on or around August 12, 2019.
Recording capabilities at MCC were expected to be offline for 8-10 days during this retrieval process.
Live viewing/monitoring of the cameras remained operational despite the recording system being down.
The email inquires about alternative remote recording options or other equipment to use while the system is offline.
